Recipes
These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.
Do you want to let members view recipes? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow recipes to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow recipes to be viewed.
Yes, allow viewing of recipes.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all recipes, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow viewing of all recipes, even private ones.
Allow Deletion of Recipes?
Do you want to let members delete recipes? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their recipes.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their recipes.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own recipes.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own recipes.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete all recipes.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete all recipes.
Allow Recipes?

column1: Do you want to allow members to create recipes?
column2: Do you want to allow members to create recipes?

column1: No, do not allow this member level to create recipes
column2: No, do not allow this member level to create recipes

column1: Yes, allow this member level to create recipes
column2: Yes, allow this member level to create recipes
Recipe Privacy
Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their recipe. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view recipes.
Recipe Comment Options

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their recipe. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on the recipe.

column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.
Public Permissions

Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Blogs, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Yes, the public can view recipes unless they are made private.
column2: Yes, the public can view recipes unless they are made private.

column1: No, the public cannot view recipes.
column2: No, the public cannot view recipes.

Recipe Comment
This email is sent to the owner of the recipe when someone comments on the recipe.
[sender_title] commented on recipe you posted

[header]

A new comment has been posted on one of your recipe by [sender_title]. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
Recipe Commented
This email is sent to a member when someone comments on a recipe the member has commented on.
[sender_title] commented on recipe you commented

[header]

[sender_title] has also commented on a recipe you commented on. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]

[footer]
